dict.acceptation: 选择，挑选；被挑选的人[事物]；选萃；[生]选择，淘汰；

sent.orig: Select Represents a selection list on an HTML form.
sent.trans: 代表HTML表单中的selection[选择]按钮。

sent.orig: Both contiguous selection and discrete selection support single-click selection and click-and-drag selection.
sent.trans: 连续选择和离散选择都支持单击选择和单击并拖动选择。

sent.orig: In particular, the machine selection incorporated with tool selection can generate extended strategies for economical production.
sent.trans: 特别是将选择机床与选择刀具相结合能对经济生产进行优化决策。

sent.orig: There are two forms selection, namely grass-roots political parties and direct pre selection meeting.
sent.trans: 预选有两种形式，分别是政党基层会议和直接预选。

sent.orig: Lead supplier pre-selection, selection, price negotiation, contract finalization.
sent.trans: 领导供应商预选，筛选，议价及合同的订立。
